description:
Joint Party Operation!: Chevy and her friends were all about to playing in the flower part until they encountered Frappe, an Apricot flavored Elephant Zooble who is having a hard time. The three convinced her to join her on their dance session but refuses. The trio then consulted to Kumanpa about Frappe`s problem and found out she is having problem about love. As they went to Frappe and talked about her love problem, they said they will find a suitable male Zooble for her. As the trio convinced Em about Frappe, Randy is about to get jealous. Also, Pom came tagging along making things worse for the trio, and even for Randy.
PiPi`s Tail Decoration: Chevy encountered the Black Candies and was told about the sparkling tail decorations that was about in the range. Even worse, Coron and Panky had tail decorations on their tails as well until PiPi, a Peach Cheese Flavored Mouse Zooble arrived and admired their new tail decoration. Seeing that Chevy doesn`t have one, she gave Chevy a tail decoration as well, except it was the worst one she had and decided to get PiPi`s. However, it got worse when she notices she lost her tail decoration on her way to the Black Candies and PiPi became saddened. Having no choice, they all consulted to Kumanpa for the missing tail decor.

titles.title: Goukon Dai Sakusen! / PiPi no Shippo Kazari
Joint Party Operation! / PiPi`s Tail Decoration
合コン大作戦! / ピピのしっぽ飾り
